title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: I don't understand bug 8142no scoped type hierarchy on binary projects.
OB: When I try to view the scoped type hierarchy in my binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant), I receive the following error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. By the way, what does this error message mean?
